name: Hisuian Tales
description:
Smeargle is going to begin an insidious journey  through dangerous lands,  ghosts and puzzles. Will he be able to save the Princess Diancie from the clutches of the frightening hoopa? 

Using smeargle's tail as brush paint magic signs and become a hero!
